data.name: Athenian Rhapsody Demo
data.detailed_description: This is the demo for the full game Athenian Rhapsody. You adventure with two characters, Richard and James, to become familiar with the style of the game and the most basic function of battling. Lots of lil' secrets in here as well!
data.about_the_game: This is the demo for the full game Athenian Rhapsody. You adventure with two characters, Richard and James, to become familiar with the style of the game and the most basic function of battling. Lots of lil' secrets in here as well!
data.short_description: This is the demo for the full game Athenian Rhapsody. You adventure with two characters, Richard and James, to become familiar with the style of the game and the most basic function of battling. Explore all you can!
